Acronia, Fated to Villainy END
W W 1 Legendary Creature - Human Peasant Creature 1/2
2 Whenever another white creature you control dies, if Acronia, Fated to Villainy is a peasant, she becomes a 2/2 Human Warrior and gains vigilance. R/WR/WR/W: If Acronia is a Warrior, she becomes a 3/2 Human Berserker. W/BW/BW/BW/B: If Acronia is a Berserker, she becomes a 4/2 Human Assassin and gains lifelink. B/RB/RB/RB/RB/R: If Acronia is an Assassin, Acronia deals 5 damage to each creature and each player.
